bpp/descriptor.name: DhiHyperlocal
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: We strive to provide valuable solutions for our customers, no matter their individual needs
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Our customers are our top priority - We strive to provide valuable solutions for our customers, no matter their individual needs. Our goal is to gain an in-depth understanding of all their challenges and issues, so we can empower them with the answers that really make a difference.

descriptor.name: ret hyderbad
descriptor.short_desc: A delivery restaurant specializes in preparing and delivering food directly to customers' locations, focusing on convenience and speed. It may operate as a virtual kitchen or a traditional restaurant offering delivery services.
descriptor.long_desc: A delivery restaurant is a food service establishment that prioritizes delivering meals to customers' homes, offices, or other locations. These restaurants often operate through online platforms, phone orders, or mobile apps. Some delivery restaurants have physical locations, while others function as ghost kitchens, focusing solely on delivery without a dine-in option. The menu is designed for efficient preparation and transport, ensuring food quality upon arrival. Delivery restaurants cater to the growing demand for convenient dining experiences, offering a wide range of cuisines and dietary options.

address.locality: 103, Raghavendra Colony, Gachibowli, Kondapur, Telangana 500084, India

descriptor.name: mexican patty sandwich
descriptor.short_desc: A flavorful Mexican patty sandwich filled with a spiced meat patty, fresh veggies, and creamy avocado, served on toasted bread for a bold and satisfying bite
descriptor.long_desc: The Mexican patty sandwich is a delicious fusion of bold flavors and hearty ingredients. It features a juicy, spiced meat patty seasoned with traditional Mexican spices, layered with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, pickled onions, and creamy avocado slices. The sandwich is served on freshly toasted bread or a soft bun, with a zesty chipotle mayo spread for an extra kick. Perfect for lunch or dinner, this sandwich delivers a taste of Mexico in every bite, combining rich textures and vibrant flavors.

descriptor.name: italian pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Italian pizza is a traditional dish originating from Italy, characterized by a thin, crisp crust, fresh ingredients, and simple yet flavorful toppings like tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
descriptor.long_desc: Italian pizza is a globally beloved dish that traces its roots to Naples, Italy. Known for its thin, wood-fired crust and high-quality ingredients, authentic Italian pizza emphasizes simplicity and flavor. Classic varieties include Margherita, topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil, symbolizing the colors of the Italian flag. Other popular styles include Marinara and Quattro Stagioni. Italian pizza differs from its American counterpart by focusing on minimal toppings and artisanal preparation methods. It is often cooked in high-temperature ovens, creating a light, airy crust with a slight char. This culinary icon reflects Italy’s rich food culture and commitment to fresh, local produce.
